img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character is engaged in combat with a boss named "Black Wind King," as indicated by the health bar at the bottom of the screen. The setting is an outdoor area with a stone path covered in leaves and surrounded by traditional-style buildings. The character on the left is wielding a staff and appears to be preparing to attack or defend against the Black Wind King, who is airborne and holding a large spear. The environment is dimly lit, with some areas illuminated by fire.
